Text: I am writing my own comment. This torrent is all in pdf format and complete. It even has a D&D soundtrack for role playing. Amazing collection. Plus I seeded for all.
An addition to previous comment, Credit to Akronsire for his hard work in compiling the original torrent. I added about 60 files to the original. Everyone enjoy!!

Amazing, two thumbs way up, at first I was having a problem where all the files were corrupt... until I read Rolandthegreat's and Wilbymilstone's comments. xD. Thanks a whole lot, no viruses, nothing but pure, hardcore DnD! (The "Book of Erotic Fantasy" is a nice addition!!)
     This is a must have for any DnD'er, I will for sure be seeding this for a long time, my thanks to you, Wilbymilstone, and to the aforementioned Akronshire!
